main_definition: Relating to parents or parenting, typically referring to the qualities, roles, behaviors, rights, responsibilities, or relationships associated with being a parent.

meanings_and_examples.example: His parental advice was invaluable when he faced difficult decisions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to the rights and responsibilities of being a parent
meanings_and_examples.example: Parental leave allows new mothers time off work after giving birth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Characteristics or behaviors typical of parents
meanings_and_examples.example: Their parental instincts kicked in immediately when they saw the child crying.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to issues, policies, and practices concerning children's wellbeood and development
meanings_and_examples.example: The government has introduced new parental support programs for working parents.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to a legal relationship between parents and their child(ren)
meanings_and_examples.example: Court proceedings can sometimes become complicated when determining the extent of parental rights and responsibilities.
